pl.ais.commons.domain.security

Class PassThroughCryptographicService

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.ais.commons.domain.security.PassThroughCryptographicService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, CryptographicService<String>

    @DomainService
public final class PassThroughCryptographicService
extends Object
implements CryptographicService<String>
    Pass-through implementation of cryptographic service.

    This implementation in fact doesn't perform any encryption. Returned DecryptableValue holds the unencrypted data passed through.

    Since:
    1.0.2
    Author:
    Warlock, AIS.PL
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
